W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_000_DETAIL.text: This is the colony where the Kuld live. The entrance is narrow, but it seems spacious inside.

W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_000_DETAIL.text: This is the colony where the Naml live. You smell something sour inside.

W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_010_DETAIL.text: This is the colony where the Naml live. The ground has caved in, filling it with earth.

W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_000_DETAIL.text: This is the colony where the Bashar live. You smell an indescribably strong odor inside.

W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_010_DETAIL.text: This is the colony where the Bashar live. The ground has caved in, filling it with earth.

W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_FROG_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_FROG_000_DETAIL.text: This is the colony where the Dufda live. The air inside is damp.

W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_FROG_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LTXT_COMM_BURROW_FROG_010_DETAIL.text: This is the colony where the Dufda live. The ground has caved in, filling it with earth.

W08_LTXT_COMM_FOSSIL_BEE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LTXT_COMM_FOSSIL_BEE_000_DETAIL.text: An image of a creature has been carved into this rock.

W08_LTXT_COMM_FOSSIL_CENTIPEDE_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W08_LTXT_COMM_FOSSIL_CENTIPEDE_000_DETAI.text: An image of a creature has been carved into this rock.

W08_LDMK_COMM_CORDYCEPS_W_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LDMK_COMM_CORDYCEPS_W_000_DETAIL.text: This is the grisly fate awaiting those who are parasitized by a mushroom. Nothing can be done for them now.

W08_LDMK_COMM_CORDYCEPS_NW_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LDMK_COMM_CORDYCEPS_NW_000_DETAIL.text: This is the grisly fate awaiting those who are parasitized by a mushroom. Nothing can be done for them now.

W08_LDMK_COMM_CORDYCEPS_S_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LDMK_COMM_CORDYCEPS_S_000_DETAIL.text: This is the grisly fate awaiting those who are parasitized by a mushroom. Nothing can be done for them now.

W08_LDMK_COMM_CORDYCEPS_E_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_LDMK_COMM_CORDYCEPS_E_000_DETAIL.text: This is the grisly fate awaiting those who are parasitized by a mushroom. Nothing can be done for them now.

W08_GIMK_COMM_DIGWALL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_GIMK_COMM_DIGWALL_000_DETAIL.text: The earth here looks softer than elsewhere. Tope should be able to dig through it.

W08_GIMK_COMM_DIGWALL_000_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W08_GIMK_COMM_DIGWALL_000_BUTTON.text: Ask Him to Dig for You

W08_GIMK_COMM_IVY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_GIMK_COMM_IVY_000_DETAIL.text: Knotted roots are blocking your path. You'll need to clear them if you want to go this way, but you sense something lurking inside.

W08_GIMK_COMM_DIRT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_GIMK_COMM_DIRT_000_DETAIL.text: A mound of earth is blocking your path. You'll need to clear it if you want to go this way. Something might also be buried under it.

W08_GIMK_COMM_STONE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_GIMK_COMM_STONE_000_DETAIL.text: Stones are blocking your path. You'll need to clear them if you want to go this way. Something might also be buried under them.

W08_GIMK_COMM_CRYSTAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_GIMK_COMM_CRYSTAL_000_DETAIL.text: A giant crystal is blocking your path. You'll need to clear it if you want to go this way. Something might also be buried under it.

W08_GIMK_COMM_WATER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_GIMK_COMM_WATER_000_DETAIL.text: Water is blocking your path. You'll need to cover it with earth if you want to go this way. Something might also be buried here.

W08_EVAR_COMM_REWORD_EARTHWORM_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_REWORD_EARTHWORM_000_DETAI.text: Coste is wandering around here, desperate for Tope to come home.

W08_EVAR_COMM_REWORD_STONE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_REWORD_STONE_000_DETAIL.text: You sense someone or something suspicious here.

W08_EVAR_COMM_FIRST_CONTACT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_FIRST_CONTACT_000_DETAIL.text: Something is on the ground. You should investigate.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_000_DETAIL.text: Make your way to the Kuld colony with Tope.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_010_DETAIL.text: One of the Bashar might be on their way to the Kuld colony. You should head over there.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_110_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_110_DETAIL.text: One of the Naml might be on their way to the Kuld colony. You should head over there.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_210_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_210_DETAIL.text: One of the Dufda might be on their way to the Kuld colony. You should head over there.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_MOLE_040_DETAIL.text: Is this where the Lord of the Earth went?

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_000_DETAIL.text: You might learn something helpful in the Naml colony.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_010_DETAIL.text: One of the Bashar might be on their way to the Naml colony. You should head over there.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_210_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_210_DETAIL.text: One of the Dufda might be on their way to the Naml colony. You should head over there.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_020_DETAIL.text: It's time to visit the Naml colony once more in search of clues.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_040_DETAIL.text: Is this where the Lord of the Earth went?

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_140_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_INSECT_140_DETAIL.text: Will you really find what you seek here?

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_000_DETAIL.text: You may learn something helpful in the Bashar colony.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_110_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_110_DETAIL.text: One of the Naml might be on their way to the Bashar colony. You should head over there.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_210_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_210_DETAIL.text: One of the Dufda might be on their way to the Bashar colony. You should head over there.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_020_DETAIL.text: It's time to visit the Bashar colony once more in search of clues.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_040_DETAIL.text: Is this where the Lord of the Earth went?

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_140_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_HUMAN_140_DETAIL.text: Will you really find what you seek here?

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_000_DETAIL.text: You may learn something helpful in the Dufda colony.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_010_DETAIL.text: One of the Bashar might be on their way to the Dufda colony. You should head over there.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_110_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_110_DETAIL.text: One of the Naml might be on their way to the Dufda colony. You should head over there.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_020_DETAIL.text: It's time to visit the Dufda colony once more in search of clues.

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_040_DETAIL.text: Is this where the Lord of the Earth went?

W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_140_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_BURROW_FROG_140_DETAIL.text: Will you really find what you seek here?

W08_EVAR_COMM_CORDYCEPS_NW_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_CORDYCEPS_NW_000_DETAIL.text: There's a disturbance in this area. Could it have something to do with the attack earlier?

W08_EVAR_COMM_FOSSIL_BEE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_FOSSIL_BEE_000_DETAIL.text: If you move both opposing keystones, the Lord of the Earth should awaken.

W08_EVAR_COMM_FOSSIL_CENTIPEDE_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_FOSSIL_CENTIPEDE_000_DETAI.text: If you move both opposing keystones, the Lord of the Earth should awaken.

W08_EVAR_COMM_FUNGUS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_COMM_FUNGUS_000_DETAIL.text: Did moving the keystones cause the Lord of the Earth to awaken? You should investigate the epicenter of the earthquake to find out.
